exception.msg: An unknown exceptions occurred, please retry later
exception.msg_cn: 发生未知错误，请稍后重试

exception.msg: Measurement service error, please retry later
exception.msg_cn: 测量服务错误，请稍后重试

exception.msg: Measurement service communication error, please check the network and retry later
exception.msg_cn: 测量服务通讯错误，请检查网络后重试

exception.msg: Unable to start a closed measurement, please create a new measurement
exception.msg_cn: 无法启动已关闭的测量，请重新开始测量

exception.msg: Do not start the measurement repeatedly
License authentication failed, please check your license or contact customer service
exception.msg_cn: 许可证认证失败，请检查许可证或联系客服

exception.msg: The fps must be greater than or equals to 12

exception.msg_cn: 健康报告测算超时，请稍后重试

exception.msg: Invalid start frame, please check the data type
exception.msg_cn: 初始视频帧非法，请检查数据格式

exception.msg: The image size is too small (400*300 at least), please adjust and retry
exception.msg_cn: 图像尺寸太小(最小400*300)，请调整后重试
人脸丢失，请重新开始测量

exception.msg: Your face has exceeded the boundary, please restart the measurement
exception.msg_cn: 人脸超出边界，请重新开始测量

exception.msg: resource file does not exist or is invalid
exception.msg_cn: 资源文件错误（不存在或文件非法）
